name: Tronix
overview: Avoid the slithering snakes. We are in the year 2525. As the head of the interplanetary expedition team, you have the task of recovering the ancient cultural treasures from the six temples of planet Tronix. First open the treasure hatch with the right lever and recover the treasure. Then use the left lever to activate the beamer and place the treasure in it. Never touch anything except the lever! Good luck (you will need it)...
